English: The Glorious Balkan Assimilation Program seeks to assimilate the foreign non-accepted cultures in the Balkans in order to properly bring them to Turkishness. Higher militancy and consciousness is to be expected, and the program has bled over into other parts of the nation as well.
This province is undergoing an assimilation program originally started by the Ottoman Turkish government.
The First Riel Rebellion ended in blood and exile. The Metis have not forgotten, nor will the government let them.
The Second Riel Rebellion has ended in the worst possible way, and the Metis are now a marginalized people in Canada.
The ongoing Caucasian War is causing unrest and lack of productivity in these provinces.

The Caucasian War is undergoing a truce, for now. The uneasy tension that the locals have with their Russian occupiers is a welcome break from the previous state of war, but it is an uneasy truce brokered by the blood of both sides.
Taras Shevchenko is gaining prominence and is affecting the Ukrainian peoples in their quest for independence and nation-building.
Taras Shevchenko is working hard after many life experiences, and is quickly becoming known as the father of the Ukrainian language and culture.

Our recent purge of the upper class fatcats will remain in the public consciousness for a while yet, but the measures we have taken will ensure that any new leeches that foolishly make themselves known will not prosper in our country for a long while.
Slavery in our nation continues on, making our country a bit less attractive as the world moves on.
Following the establishment of the new Byzantine Empire a policy of assimilation was enacted across the empire to bring people together in the Greek way of life.
Our control of this trade port allows us to divert vast amounts of Chinese goods into our trade network
Our control of this trade port allows us to divert vast amounts of Chinese goods into our trade network
Our control of this trade port allows us to divert vast amounts of Chinese goods into our trade network
Our treatment of native soldiers has attracted the ire of some in our empire.
Delicate treatment of our less than loyal regiments has attracted the sympathy of native peoples.
Our nation thrives and therefore more people flock to our cities each day.
Our country is no longer a signatory of the Geneva Convention.

Conscripts are being drafted left and right and our poor are being trained and prepared to fight, yet there's no war. This large disruption in the country's daily life is making our pops tired and our neighbors wary.
Our city is rebuilding after it suffered a catastrophic fire.
Our nation thrives and therefore more people flock to our cities each day.
The capital of this province was recently built by the government, moving a lot of workers to the region to  build a city with modern infrastructure.
A Pandemic of Influenza ravages our country, but this small isolated community is immune to it, thank to its remote location.
Our country social reforms match every socialist demand, having some scholars call us an welfare state.
We own the Kiel Canal, linking the Baltic and the North Sea without the need to sail around Denmark, and we receive the dividends of its toll.
We own the Suez Canal, linking the Mediterranean and the Red Sea without the need to sail around Africa, and we receive the dividends of its toll and glory for its possession.
We own the Panama Canal, a huge feat of engineering linking the Pacific and the Atlantic Oceans, and we receive the dividends of its toll and glory for its possession.
Support for the current war is weak, with a little effort we could start a propaganda campaign to convince them otherwise.

Education in our country is full blown ideological indoctrination, and has severe changes every time our leader changes. Universal public education is thus enforced and alphabetization is a priority, but at the cost of free thinking.

A cult of personality arises when an individual uses mass media, propaganda, or other methods, to create an idealized, heroic, and at times, worshipful image, often through unquestioning flattery and praise.

Totalitarianism is a political system in which the state holds total authority over the society and seeks to control all aspects of public and private life wherever possible. Anyone opposed to the government's absolute authority is forced into hiding, or faces punishment in prison or even in Gulags/Concentration Camps. The entire population is, willingly or unwillingly, conscripted to serve the state's priorities.

To overcome our enemies we must have our own militarism. We must carry along with 90 percent out of the total population of our country. As for the rest, we have nothing to say to them. They must be annihilated.
The foundation of the Danish Moor Company lead to the drainage and improvement of vast areas.
The Suez Canal is currently under construction. After each completed phase an event will fire to keep you informed of the progress. Construction will take approximately 10 years.

English: The Hay-Bunau-Varilla treaty was an agreement between the USA and the Panama granting exclusive canal rights to the USA across the isthmus of Panama in exchange for a financial reimbursement of 10,000,000 plus an annuity of 250,000.
French: Le traité Hay-Bunau-Varilla était un accord entre les USA et le Panama accordant des droits de canal exclusifs en USA à travers l'isthme du Panama en échange d'un remboursement financier de 10,000,000 plus une annuité de 250,000.

English: We are leading the Atlantic Slave Trade, bringing us prosperity and a regular supply of slaves for our plantations.
The shackles of slavery have been torn off of our populace, and we are now adjusting to an industrialized economy. Surely we will be a global competitor soon.
Slavery will never be obsolete! We have modernized the old system, working to create a slave economy for the industrial world.

Some lucky slaves have earned their freedom, or were spared enslavement in the first place. Their freedom is at an end. We will seek them out and make them work, though it will lower our standing in the world and could spark rebellion amongst the people of $COUNTRY$.
To improve our grip on slavery, we must spread word amongst the people that slavery is good, and will lead to a better nation. So long as there is any doubt about slavery, this propaganda must go on.
We are good to those people who come into our nation, and we have become well known for this politeness and charity.
We welcome foreigners to our lands, and many of our own people act as ambassadors to the countries they visit, bringing news of our great nation.

Founded in 1871, the National Rifle Association was originally a set of shooting clubs organized to improve the marksmanship of American soldiers. These shooting clubs improved skill with firearms, and contributed to the military as a whole moving away from the classic style of rank and file warfare, which put focus on volume of fire rather than accuracy.
The Mississippi has burst its banks, causing massive devastation.

The heretical Freemasons have been removed from the Catholic clergy in Brazil, improving our standing with the people and the Vatican but severely reducing the effectiveness of our clergy for some time.
Tensions between African-born slaves and mulatto slaves are making both groups less likely to revolt by preventing their unification against their slave masters.
There is a hideout of escaped slaves, Maroons, in this province, and they are causing trouble for local plantations.

The magnanimous Dom Pedro II is the Emperor of Brazil. A powerful and respected statesman, he is beloved by the people and has an inextinguishable fire in his heart for the further freedom of his people and their continued greatness.
Our nation is under a fragile regency, with the monarchy lacking the power that it should truly have. Beware, for this may encourage coup attempts by disgruntled people in our country.
A group of enterprising capitalists have formed a Progressive Society in this province, in an attempt to discredit slavery.
Slaves in this province have been reading and learning the ideas of Marx and other communist philosophers.
Factory and owners and other employers in this province have been hiring immigrants and other cheap labor, as they cost less than maintaining slaves.
The population of slaves changed in our country.
Archaeological studies in Pompeii enhance our national science and reputation.
Local excavations are held to train our archaeologists.
The communication between our expedition in Peru and our archaeological society is interrupted. Until the war goes on, our enemies will try to disturb every information exchange.
We are currently processing the payments from the Panama Canal Treaty.
We are currently processing the payments from the Suez Canal Treaty.
The Merchant Marine operates a Naval School in the country, providing lessons in leadership and education in the latest naval technologies.
French: La marine marchande exploite une école navale dans cette province. Outre l'art du commandement, on apprend à utiliser les dernières technologies navales.
German: Die Handelsmarine betreibt eine Marineschule in dieser Provinz, wo sie Unterricht in Führungstum und den neuesten Flottentechnologien anbietet
Spanish: La marina mercante tiene una escuela naval en esta provincia que ofrece enseñanzas en materia de liderazgo y educación, además de las últimas tecnologías navales.

English: Treaty port negotiations are underway with China.
The Rhine Crisis has escalated into a full scale war with the Germans.
With our strict border control policy we are giving a hard time to anyone who wants to leave or come to our country.
